name: re:CyCle-EChO
description:
In the distant future of 2021...
The rich have taken control of the earth, and are destroying it with their ever increasing greed...
Equipped with a recycle gun, Echo decides it's time for her to push back...

Made for A Game By Its Cover 2020 and based on a Famicase design by t3nshi.

Learn more about climate change and what you can do at
https://www.ipcc.ch/
https://climate.nasa.gov/
https://www.greenpeace.org/
https://fridaysforfuture.org/
and remember to vote!

3D Art: Synty Studios
Animations: Mixamo
Emoji: Twemoji
Character Controller: Ultimate FPS
Sound Effects: Ultimate FPS and The Soniss GDC 2019 Game Audio Bundle
Music: Peppers Theme by Kevin MacLeod
